message:
I'm enjoying the "From Dusk Till Dawn" TV show. It somehow mixes over-the-top horror with an interesting plot and characters. The first few episodes might feel slow (I liked them anyway) but as the season (10 eps) draws to an end, it's gotten crazy.

It's on the new El Rey network. Comcast carries it. (eztv.it also does.)
